```{r}
# numeric vector
nums <- c(1.1, 3, -5.7)
```

```{r}
# integer vector
ints <- c(1L, 5L, -3L) # force storage as integer not decimal number
# 'L' is for 'long integer'

idevs <- sample(ints, 100, replace=TRUE)
```

```{r}
# character vector
chars <- c('hi', 'hallo', "mother's", 'father\'s',
  "She said, 'hi'", "He said, \"hi\"")
chars
```
